title: The Image makers
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - Canada
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Canada - History
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/National Film Board of Canada
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
description: A documentary about the National Film Board of Canada made to commemorate the Board's 40th anniversary in 1979. It is a montage representing the work of over 400 people whose dedicated efforts have garnered over 1800 international awards for the Board. Sometimes majestic, sometimes whimsical, the film is a revue of a nation's sights and sounds.
